titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Guide to the English for International Students, records , 1975-1990 RG0071
titlestmt.author: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-11 11:52:19 -0500.

repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: George Washington University. Dept. of English as a Foreign Language

did.abstract: This collection consists of memos, reports, brochures, by-laws an enrollment profiles. The material ranges in date from 1975-90.

prefercite.head: Preferred citation
prefercite.p: English for International Students, records , Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Series 1 is closed to research for 25 years from date of record creation.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These records were transfered to University Archives in 1989

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

bioghist.head: Historical or Biographical Note
bioghist.p: English for International Students is a part of the English as a Foreign Language Department. Its purpose is to test non-English speaking students as to there ability to research, write and attend lectures in English.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of memos, reports, brochures, by-laws an enrollment profiles. The material ranges in date from 1975-90.

arrangement.head: Collection Organization
arrangement.p: Organized in two series Memos, reports, brochures, and Departmental files.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series consists of memos, reports, brochures, by-laws, and enrollment profiles. The materials range in date from 1975-90, and were transfered to University Archives in 1989.
This series has a paper container list in the reading room, please ask staff for assistance.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series contains correspondence, flyers, new releases, programs, brochures, posters, signature sheets, and flyers. They range in date from 1967 to 1990. The materials concern forums, courses, scholarships, the Department of Slavic Languages and Literatures history, Arkady Belinkov, WTOP-TV courses, workshops, and Delta Phi Alpha (National German Honor Society), Delta Phi Alpha constitution.
